planets.physics.physicsObjects

Class NewtonianObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • planets.physics.physicsObjects.NewtonianObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Planet

    public class NewtonianObject
extends java.lang.Object
    All Newtonian objects have position, velocity, and mass.
    Author:
    David Cosby
